value:
They say a Crest gives you freedom.
What's free about being shackled to a
power you never chose for yourself?

This place is a paradise compared to
where I came fromâ€”for the food
alone, if nothing else.

Oh, Felix...you were so adorable, the
way you'd come crying to me over
every little thing. What happened?

Askr is a showcase of all the beautiful
specimens you can find in other
worlds. I mean the flowers, obviously.

Of course I talk to a beautiful woman
when I see one! What am I supposed
to do, give her the cold shoulder?

Don't mind me, just admiring the
scenery. Oh, I brought supplies for
you from $Nf.

Child's play. I'm getting better and
better at this.
I could get used to this.
Luck wasn't on my side this time.

So, this is what it means to get
stronger? I'm finally getting it.

I am Sylvain Jose Gautier. And since
you're counting on me, I guess I'll
show you a little of what I can do.

Do you believe our fates are decided
at birth, $Nu?$k$pPersonally, I can't stand the idea.
To live your whole life according to
someone else's expectations...$k$pIn my view, a life like that is nothing
short of cursed.$k$pThat's why I admire Askr's Heroes.
They're strong enough to defy
destiny and live how they choose.$k$pI guess fate's a heavy subject though,
huh? Let's talk about something else,
like... What are you doing later?$k$pHah! You think I'd ask you out just
to avoid my insecurities? You might
be too insightful for your own good.
Open wide!
Don't underestimate me!
Gonna need you to move!
Take this!
Can't...believe it...

I'm Sylvain Jose Gautier. Feel free to say hi whenever
you like.
Hey, no need to push me around. I get enough of that from Ingrid.
If I'm ever coming on too strong, just say the word.
One thing I definitely don't miss about Faerghus is the food. Seriously, we're way behind this place.
Felix is like a little brother to me. That's why I can't take him seriously.
A Crest isn't a privilege. Don't let anyone tell you otherwise.
I guess...I joke around a lot because it's safe. If you really get to know me, you might not like what you see.
I'm on it.
If you say so...
Shall we?
